00029 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.FOAF

00034     public class Person
00035     {
00036         #region Constructors

00040         public Person()
00041         {
00042         }
00043 
00048         public Person(XmlElement Element)
00049         {
00050             if (Element.Name.Equals("foaf:Person", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00051             {
00052                 foreach (XmlNode Child in Element.ChildNodes)
00053                 {
00054                     if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:name", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00055                     {
00056                         Name = Child.InnerText;
00057                     }
00058                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00059                     {
00060                         Title = Child.InnerText;
00061                     }
00062                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:givenname", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00063                     {
00064                         GivenName = Child.InnerText;
00065                     }
00066                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:family_name", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00067                     {
00068                         FamilyName = Child.InnerText;
00069                     }
00070                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:mbox_sha1sum", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase) || Child.Name.Equals("foaf:mbox", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00071                     {
00072                         Email.Add(Child.InnerText);
00073                     }
00074                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:homepage", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00075                     {
00076                         if (Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"] != null)
00077                         {
00078                             Homepage.Add(Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"].Value);
00079                         }
00080                     }
00081                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:depiction", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00082                     {
00083                         if (Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"] != null)
00084                         {
00085                             Depiction.Add(Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"].Value);
00086                         }
00087                     }
00088                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:phone", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00089                     {
00090                         if (Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"] != null)
00091                         {
00092                             Phone.Add(Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"].Value);
00093                         }
00094                     }
00095                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:workplacehomepage", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00096                     {
00097                         if (Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"] != null)
00098                         {
00099                             WorkplaceHomepage = Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"].Value;
00100                         }
00101                     }
00102                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:workinfohomepage", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00103                     {
00104                         if (Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"] != null)
00105                         {
00106                             WorkInfoHomepage = Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"].Value;
00107                         }
00108                     }
00109                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:schoolhomepage", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00110                     {
00111                         if (Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"] != null)
00112                         {
00113                             SchoolHomepage = Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"].Value;
00114                         }
00115                     }
00116                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("foaf:knows", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00117                     {
00118                         foreach (XmlNode Child2 in Child.ChildNodes)
00119                         {
00120                             PeopleKnown.Add(new Person((XmlElement)Child2));
00121                         }
00122                     }
00123                     else if (Child.Name.Equals("rdfs:seeAlso", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00124                     {
00125                         if (Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"] != null)
00126                         {
00127                             SeeAlso = Child.Attributes["rdf:resource"].Value;
00128                         }
00129                     }
00130                 }
00131             }
00132         }
00133         #endregion

00136         private string _SeeAlso = "";
00137         private string _Name = "";
00138         private string _Title = "";
00139         private string _GivenName = "";
00140         private string _FamilyName = "";
00141         private string _NickName = "";
00142         private List<string> _Email = new List<string>();
00143         private List<string> _Homepage = new List<string>();
00144         private List<string> _Depiction = new List<string>();
00145         private List<string> _Phone = new List<string>();
00146         private string _WorkplaceHomepage = "";
00147         private string _WorkInfoHomepage = "";
00148         private string _SchoolHomepage = "";
00149         private List<Person> _PeopleKnown = new List<Person>();

00283         public override string ToString()
00284         {
00285             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00286             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Name))
00287                 Builder.Append("<foaf:name>" + Name + "</foaf:name>");
00288             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Title))
00289                 Builder.Append("<foaf:title>" + Title + "</foaf:title>");
00290             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(GivenName))
00291                 Builder.Append("<foaf:givenname>" + GivenName + "</foaf:givenname>");
00292             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(FamilyName))
00293                 Builder.Append("<foaf:family_name>" + FamilyName + "</foaf:family_name>");
00294             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(NickName))
00295                 Builder.Append("<foaf:nick>" + NickName + "</foaf:nickname>");
00296             foreach (string CurrentEmail in Email)
00297             {
00298                 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(CurrentEmail))
00299                 {
00300                     if (CurrentEmail.Contains("@"))
00301                     {
00302                         Builder.Append("<foaf:mbox>" + CurrentEmail + "</foaf:mbox>");
00303                     }
00304                     else
00305                     {
00306                         Builder.Append("<foaf:mbox_sha1sum>" + CurrentEmail + "</foaf:mbox_sha1sum>");
00307                     }
00308                 }
00309             }
00310             foreach (string CurrentHomePage in Homepage)
00311             {
00312                 if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(CurrentHomePage))
00313                     Builder.Append("<foaf:homepage rdf:resource=\"" + CurrentHomePage + "\" />");
00314             }
00315             foreach (string CurrentDepiction in Depiction)
00316             {
00317                 if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(CurrentDepiction))
00318                     Builder.Append("<foaf:depiction rdf:resource=\"" + CurrentDepiction + "\" />");
00319             }
00320             foreach (string CurrentPhone in Phone)
00321             {
00322                 if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(CurrentPhone))
00323                     Builder.Append("<foaf:phone rdf:resource=\"" + CurrentPhone + "\" />");
00324             }
00325             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(WorkplaceHomepage))
00326                 Builder.Append("<foaf:workplaceHomepage rdf:resource=\"" + WorkplaceHomepage + "\" />");
00327             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(WorkInfoHomepage))
00328                 Builder.Append("<foaf:workInfoHomepage rdf:resource=\"" + WorkInfoHomepage + "\" />");
00329             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(SchoolHomepage))
00330                 Builder.Append("<foaf:schoolHomepage rdf:resource=\"" + SchoolHomepage + "\" />");
00331             foreach (Person CurrentPerson in PeopleKnown)
00332             {
00333                 if (CurrentPerson != null)
00334                 {
00335                     Builder.Append("<foaf:knows><foaf:Person>");
00336                     Builder.Append(CurrentPerson.ToString());
00337                     Builder.Append("</foaf:Person></foaf:knows>");
00338                 }
00339             }
00340             if(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(SeeAlso))
00341                 Builder.Append("<rdfs:seeAlso rdf:resource=\"" + SeeAlso + "\"/>");
00342             return Builder.ToString();
00343         }
00344         #endregion
00345     }
